subject: Dreamweaver only $59
body:
And still they gazed, and still the wonder grew, that one small head could carry all he knew.

Age imprints more wrinkles in the mind than it does on the face.

I am not a speed reader. I am a speed understander.

A losing trade, I assure you, sir: literature is a drug.

Anybody who gets away with something will come back to get away with a little bit more.

For virtue's self may too much zeal be had the worst of madmen is a saint run mad.

Anger as soon as fed is dead 'Tis starving makes it fat.

Lying to ourselves is more deeply ingrained than lying to others.

Fear is the biggest motivator.

Do you know what a soldier is, young man? He's the chap who makes it possible for civilized folk to despise war.

Golf is the pursuit of the infinite.

The savage bows down to idols of wood and stone: the civilized man to idols of flesh and blood.

Growing old is no more than a bad habit which a busy man has no time to form.
